alert.note: Alert for Erath (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 10:41PM CDT until May 19 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Erath County in north central Texas... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1040 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dublin, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stephenville, Dublin, Purves, Harbin, Bunyan and Highland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
